altername_name: The Smurfs: Dance Party (Toys R Us Edition)
name: The Smurfs: Dance Party
overview: The gameplay is similar to the concept Ubisoft current dance franchise, Just Dance, The Smurfs: Dance Party allows players to dance alongside Papa Smurf, Clumsy Smurf, Brainy Smurf, Gutsy Smurf, Smurfette, and Gargamel. The Toys R Us Edition includes an extra track.
